documents.document: @PacifistIreland @Office_Zombie @AmnestyIreland @SIPOC Still waiting.

@DonTonyD @WrestlingSoup Good segment on White Moose. I should point out that the hotel would be considered an average price for Dublin. It's 124 euro (154 USD) per night. I was at the cafe last year after similar viral stuff. They are brilliant at getting free publicity.
Dodging the question. https://t.co/i6VGj2zd2h
@WrestlingSoup @jon7687 @DonTonyD @whitemoosecafe Excellent! I look forward to the segment. That hotel/cafe is infamous for not putting up with BSers.
@WrestlingSoup @jon7687 @DonTonyD Hey Mish I look forward to hearing that segment. If you weren't aware, The hotel is called Charleville Lodge. Twitter account: @whitemoosecafe
@PacifistIreland @Office_Zombie @AmnestyIreland @SIPOC Awaiting your answer.
@PacifistIreland @Office_Zombie @AmnestyIreland @SIPOC "Love Both". Are the donors published? You can't accuse without having your own house in order.
The Pro-L*fe bots are suddenly out in force. Somebody is paying for this. Pathetic.
@PacifistIreland @Office_Zombie @AmnestyIreland @SIPOC I'm asking you about your funds.

@conorthomas89 https://t.co/iIyti19qxB It's a poor attempt at humour. You don't solve anything by attacking people.

@conorthomas89 FWIW the Noel Rock tweet was pathetic. I'm no fan of Paul Murphy but associating him with this thuggery is classless. Accounts like Revolution could learn that people that disagree with you are not automatically on the 'other side' of everything else.
@conorthomas89 Ah I appreciate you going to bat for me but it's fine, really. If what I said causes me to get blocked then I'm happier to be blocked.
@conorthomas89 Otherwise your ideas never get questioned and you never learn/change your mind about things.
@conorthomas89 Ah not to worry. I don't agree with a lot of your stuff but twitter shouldn't be a vacuum of accounts you completely agree with.
@conorthomas89 I questioned his tweet that bankers/DoB/media were to blame for the Lidl incident. I raised some points. Then I was blocked.
@conorthomas89 Revolution_IRL sadly blocked me when I dared question his earlier tweet.
@Revolution_IRL Correct me if I'm wrong please: Destroying property and costing jobs does not put people with no connection to that business in jail.
@Revolution_IRL And what does stealing and destroying property do to solve this?
I don't envy @IrishRail workers right now. Passed the DART line earlier. A river of snow. Good luck to them tonight/tomorrow.
@Revolution_IRL Bad behaviour doesn't justify more bad behaviour. That's essentially what you're saying. I can't agree with that.
@Revolution_IRL This is called moving the goalposts. Good luck.
@Revolution_IRL The young lads just wanted to destroy and loot. Simple.
